channel.title: OpenTelemetry Collector Contrib をインストールする on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Recent content in OpenTelemetry Collector Contrib をインストールする on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops

item.title: OpenTelemetry Collector Contribをインストールする
item.description: Collector が動作していることを確認する これで、Collector が動いているはずです。root権限で systemctl コマンドを使って、それを確かめてみましょう。 ​ Command Status Output sudo systemctl status otelcol-contrib ● otelcol-contrib.service - OpenTelemetry Collector Contrib Loaded: loaded (/lib/systemd/system/otelcol-contrib.service; enabled; vendor preset: enabled) Active: active (running) since Tue 2023-05-16 08:23:23 UTC; 25s ago Main PID: 1415 (otelcol-contrib) Tasks: 5 (limit: 1141) Memory: 22.2M CPU: 125ms CGroup: /system.slice/otelcol-contrib.service └─1415 /usr/bin/otelcol-contrib --config=/etc/otelcol-contrib/config.yaml May 16 08:23:39 ip-10-0-9-125 otelcol-contrib[1415]: NumberDataPoints #0 May 16 08:23:39 ip-10-0-9-125 otelcol-contrib[1415]: Data point attributes: May 16 08:23:39 ip-10-0-9-125 otelcol-contrib[1415]: -> exporter: Str(logging) May 16 08:23:39 ip-10-0-9-125 otelcol-contrib[1415]: -> service_instance_id: Str(df8a57f4-abdc-46b9-a847-acd62db1001f) May 16 08:23:39 ip-10-0-9-125 otelcol-contrib[1415]: -> service_name: Str(otelcol-contrib) May 16 08:23:39 ip-10-0-9-125 otelcol-contrib[1415]: -> service_version: Str(0.
